name: BeautifulExample
comment:
Create beautiful examples to show off your Elm packages and projects.

@docs Config, sandbox, element, document, application, view

aliases.name: Config
aliases.comment:
Configuration for `BeautifulExample.view`

  - title: The title of the example
  - details: An optional explanatory paragraph about the example
  - color: The the color to use to theme the example (grey will be used if you give `Nothing`)
  - maxWidth: The maximum width of the container for the example
    (This allows the example to be nicely centered.)
  - githubUrl: If given, show a github icon with a link to this URL
  - documentationUrl: If given, show an Elm icon with a link to this URL
aliases.type: { title : String.String, details : Maybe.Maybe String.String, color : Maybe.Maybe Color.Color, maxWidth : Basics.Int, githubUrl : Maybe.Maybe String.String, documentationUrl : Maybe.Maybe String.String }

values.name: application
values.comment: Turn a `Browser.application` into a beautiful example
values.type: BeautifulExample.Config -> { init : flags -> Url.Url -> Browser.Navigation.Key -> ( model, Platform.Cmd.Cmd msg ), view : model -> Browser.Document msg, update : msg -> model -> ( model, Platform.Cmd.Cmd msg ), subscriptions : model -> Platform.Sub.Sub msg, onUrlRequest : Browser.UrlRequest -> msg, onUrlChange : Url.Url -> msg } -> Platform.Program flags model msg

values.name: document
values.comment: Turn a `Browser.document` into a beautiful example
values.type: BeautifulExample.Config -> { init : flags -> ( model, Platform.Cmd.Cmd msg ), view : model -> Browser.Document msg, update : msg -> model -> ( model, Platform.Cmd.Cmd msg ), subscriptions : model -> Platform.Sub.Sub msg } -> Platform.Program flags model msg

values.name: element
values.comment: Turn a `Browser.element` into a beautiful example
values.type: BeautifulExample.Config -> { init : flags -> ( model, Platform.Cmd.Cmd msg ), view : model -> Html.Html msg, update : msg -> model -> ( model, Platform.Cmd.Cmd msg ), subscriptions : model -> Platform.Sub.Sub msg } -> Platform.Program flags model msg

values.name: sandbox
values.comment: Turn a `Browser.sandbox` into a beautiful example
values.type: BeautifulExample.Config -> { init : model, view : model -> Html.Html msg, update : msg -> model -> model } -> Platform.Program () model msg

values.name: view
values.comment:
Turn arbitrary Html into a beautiful example.

Typically, you will want to use [`program`](#program) or [`beginnerProgram`](#beginnerProgram) instead.
